name: optimus-crime
description: Interactive application where users alike can get the chance to read & comment on true crime cases.

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: npm init -y && npm install if-env && npm install -D concurrently && cd client && npm i && npm i apollo-boost graphql graphql-tag @apollo/react-hooks react-router-dom jwt-decode && cd ../server && npm i && npm i apollo-server-express jsonwebtoken
